DOC.brief_summary: Pharmacokinetic Safety Study Adalimumab Chinese Subjects Mild Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Safety Study With Adalimumab Chinese Subjects With Mild Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Male Female age 18 year old . Mild RA . Body weight less 100 kg . Wheelchairbound bedridden . Joint surgery involve joint assess within study , within two month prior Screening visit . Intraarticular , intramuscular intravenous ( IV ) administration corticosteroid within 28 day prior Screening visit . Prior treatment TNF antagonist , include adalimumab . Positive tuberculin PPD 5 . Female subject pregnant breastfeeding . History HIV immunocompromised . History malignancy . Poorly control medical condition .
